title: Highly selective and flexible silver nanoparticles-based paper sensor for on-site colorimetric detection of paraquat pesticide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28844-28853
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04557B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sanjeev Bhandari, Vijay Singh Parihar, Minna Kellomäki, Mrityunjoy Mahato
Paper-based sensors or paper-based analytical devices (PADs) have recently emerged as the cost-efficient, and portable, on-site detection tools for various biological and environmental analytes.
